title: How Much Is a Little Girl Worth?
description: You’re beautiful, worthy, and you should be lovedBecause of all that you are.Different from anything else in the world,You are precious beyond the stars.How Much is a Little Girl Worth? is Rachael Denhollander’s tender hearted anthem to little girls everywhere, teaching them that they have immeasurable worth because they are made in the image of God. Armed with this understanding, girls will develop confidence in their own value and blossom into women who can face any challenge life puts in their path.This powerful message, paired with vivid, glowing illustrations will make you want to snuggle up with your little girl and remind her of how precious and treasured she is.
author: Rachael Denhollander
